about.name: Felipe Silveira
about.title: Full‑Stack Developer • Data‑Driven Builder
about.summary: I craft reliable web apps with React, TypeScript, and Node, and turn product and business questions into data‑backed decisions.
bullets: Strong in React + TS, API integration, and clean UI/UX
Hands‑on with SQL and Power BI for insights and dashboards
Collaborative, pragmatic, and fast to learn new domains

experiences.description: I'm the main developer responsible for maintaining the company's ERP by developing new modules using React and fixing backend errors on their APIs.

sistaq.description: Modernized an ERP interface with React + TypeScript, improving usability, navigation, and data entry workflows. Delivered clean UI patterns, better form validation, and faster tables with filtering and sorting.

cosmonaut.description: Built an e‑commerce prototype with product catalog, cart flows, and webhook-based integrations. Focused on component reuse, accessibility, and a smooth browsing experience.

kpi.title: Key Performance Indicators
kpi.description: Using Power Query for data ingestion, DAX for measures, and custom visuals for KPI tracking, I built Maintenance and Supplies modules to give Engineering, Operations, and Finance real-time visibility into cost drivers. Users slice by period, drill into personnel, overhead, and inventory, and compare actuals vs targets at a glance.

workforce.title: Workforce Cost
workforce.description: Created a dedicated Maintenance – Personnel page to drill into every element of headcount cost. Added a Deviation Analysis view where actual monthly and cumulative personnel spend are plotted against dynamic target lines for quick variance diagnosis.
